column180:
We need to do something about Global warming NOW. In 10 or 15 years it will be too late. All the weather catastrophes happening now in the U.S. and globally are because of climate change. It needs to be priority No. 1 in the next election. If we do not do something NOW, what are we leaving our future generations ? What will happen to our planet ? 
 If Congress could enact legislation sooner than later, lowering greenhouse gases, forcing companies to take measures to promote a healthy planet, that would be a start. 
 The U.S. could set an example that other countries could try and emulate.  
 I m not optimistic though.
